snippet.title: Space Farmers Trailer
snippet.description:
http://spacefarmers.bumpkinbrothers.com

Grab a friend, grab a gadget, grab a gun and get ready for the most fun you'll ever have in a co-op game.

In Space Farmers you and a friend will encounter many different gadgets, guns, puzzles, pigs and killer robots in this one of a kind co-operative action adventure. Escape from the alien ship together and try not to injure each other in the process!

Space Farmers has just entered Beta! It will be released on Steam and Desura for PC, Mac and Linux on the 10th of April 2014.

Do you have an active Youtube channel? Get in touch if you'd like to make a let's play video!

Keep in touch with the BumpkinBrothers:

Twitter (BumpkinBrothers official): https://twitter.com/bumpkinbros
Twitter (Rich) https://twitter.com/BumpkinRich
Twitter (Andy) https://twitter.com/BumpkinAndy

Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/spacefarmers
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/bumpkinbrothers
Tumblr: http://bumpkinbrothers.tumblr.com
